title: Bugsplat and corrupted data
body: im getting really tired of this. i can play all day some days no problems, then others i get 3-4 bug-splats in a day. when i happens it wont let me reconnect to game, so i have to close the client and re-open it, causing it to say there is corrupted data and needs to be repaired. now im placed in a low priority que and have to wait 10 minutes before i can even look for a team to join. this has been happening a lot over the past month and was wondering if this is happening to anyone else and if anyone has any ideas on a fix. Im still useing old client if that matters

replies.body:
First, have you attempted to use the new client?
Second, have you made sure your hard drive integrity is fine, and are you experiencing any other glitches or strange errors in other programs?
i used the new client awhile back and it caused a lot more issues so i had to revert back to old client. and no im not experiencing any other problems or glitches with other programs
